TIXToken.continueGeneration (/unique_chucks/2/0xea1f346faf023f974eb5adaf088bbcdf02d761f4.sol#321-332) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply == tixStalled.totalSupply() && tixStalled.isFinalized()

TIXToken.continueGeneration (/unique_chucks/2/0xea1f346faf023f974eb5adaf088bbcdf02d761f4.sol#321-332) uses a dangerous strict equality:

TIXToken.generateTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xea1f346faf023f974eb5adaf088bbcdf02d761f4.sol#274-302) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply == tokenGenerationCap

	External calls:
	- balanceOf = tixStalled.balanceOf(_owner) (/unique_chucks/2/0xea1f346faf023f974eb5adaf088bbcdf02d761f4.sol#312-315)
	State variables written after the call(s):
